targets.query: SELECT mean("iops_in_progress") FROM "autogen"."diskio" WHERE ("host"::tag = 'albiondmz1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval*5)
SELECT mean("iops_in_progress") FROM "autogen"."diskio" WHERE ("host"::tag = 'albiondmz2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval*5)
SELECT mean("iops_in_progress") FROM "autogen"."diskio" WHERE ("host"::tag = 'albionarb') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval*5)
SELECT mean("iops_in_progress") FROM "autogen"."diskio" WHERE ("host"::tag = 'albionelastic') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval*5)
SELECT mean("iops_in_progress") FROM "autogen"."diskio" WHERE ("host"::tag = 'albionmon') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval*5)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"),10s) as "read" FROM "autogen"."diskio" WHERE ("host"::tag = 'albiondmz1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval*5)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"),10s) as "write" FROM "autogen"."diskio" WHERE ("host"::tag = 'albiondmz1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval*5)
